sense.def:
Pollution
je proces, v katerem voda, zrak ali ozračje postaja vedno bolj umazano in škodljivo za živa bitja.

seg.quote: ...changes in the climate due to pollution of the atmosphere by industrial waste.

sense.def:
Pollution
so tudi nezaželene snovi, ki onesnažujejo vodo, zrak ali ozračje.

seg.quote: They didn't seem to notice the pollution and the noise.
